entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 1.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the morning with a few flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 17 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Tuesday 11 April 2023
